column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered a peperoni deep dish
column2: and when we ordered our waiter said it would take 45 minutes. It took 45 minutes. However
column4: he said because it took so long he would give us a free dessert! Right on! The pizza was delicious
column5: like I said I'm not a huge fan of deep dish because of the amounts of cheese they put on it
column6: but we both cleared our plates.
